page.title: 13School (continued)
page.content: There is then the other building.That is a long one, which altogether has six rooms and a kind of cupboard to keep paper and stuff in. Four of these rooms are classrooms, but there is also a room thet the Headmaster used to teach in.Now it is only used a few times.The sixth room is craft room.Right next to the long building,the new building,there is a kiln which the craft people use. We have three playgrounds.The biggest one is for all the new building children.Next to it there is a small one which we use for lining up for dinner.There is another playground for the infants. We have a field which we use as a playground in the Summer. We have an outdoor swimming pool which we also use in the Summer.
